abstract: Toyota’s announced today that the plug-in Prius will be available in two years, and “smart grid” technologies are also feeling pressure to keep up.
snippet: Toyota’s announced today that the plug-in Prius will be available in two years, and “smart grid” technologies are also feeling pressure to keep up.
lead_paragraph: Toyota announced on Monday plans to begin selling “several tens of thousands” of plug-in versions of its popular Prius hybrid in 2012 2011, as Hiroko Tabuchi reports.

headline.main: The Dawn of Plug-In Priuses and Smart Meters
